com.mumfrey.liteloader

Interface LiteMod

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Exposable, Listener
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ChatFilter, ChatListener, ChatRenderListener, EntityRenderListener, FrameBufferListener, GameLoopListener, HUDRenderListener, InitCompleteListener, JoinGameListener, OutboundChatFilter, OutboundChatListener, PacketHandler, Permissible, PlayerClickListener, PlayerInteractionListener, PlayerMoveListener, PluginChannelListener, PostLoginListener, PostRenderListener, PreJoinGameListener, PreRenderListener, RenderListener, ScreenshotListener, ServerChatFilter, ServerCommandProvider, ServerPlayerListener, ServerTickable, ShutdownListener, Tickable, ViewportListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PermissibleAllMods, PermissionsManagerClient

    public interface LiteMod
extends Exposable, Listener
    Base interface for mods
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getVersion()
      Get the mod version string
      void init(java.io.File configPath)
      Do startup stuff here, minecraft is not fully initialised when this function is called so mods must not interact with minecraft in any way here.
      void upgradeSettings(java.lang.String version, java.io.File configPath, java.io.File oldConfigPath)
      Called when the loader detects that a version change has happened since this mod was last loaded.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.mumfrey.liteloader.api.Listener

        getName

    • Method Detail

      • getVersion

        java.lang.String getVersion()
        Get the mod version string
        Returns:
        the mod version as a string

      • init

        void init(java.io.File configPath)
        Do startup stuff here, minecraft is not fully initialised when this function is called so mods must not interact with minecraft in any way here.
        Parameters:
        configPath - Configuration path to use

      • upgradeSettings

        void upgradeSettings(java.lang.String version,
                     java.io.File configPath,
                     java.io.File oldConfigPath)
        Called when the loader detects that a version change has happened since this mod was last loaded.
        Parameters:
        version - new version
        configPath - Path for the new version-specific config
        oldConfigPath - Path for the old version-specific config
